attributes.action: Allow from the age of 15 to get there full Driving
attributes.additional_details: Because i beleive there are lots of parents and elderly people who cant get around very easy and there child being able to drive at 15 is very helping!
attributes.background: To change the rule to be allowed to drive from the age of 15

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640011
